attributes.action: Allow Key workers to resume their driving tests like the first Lockdown!
attributes.additional_details: If this was done young carers and older who don’t particularly want to be on public transport may be getting their household to leave the house to take them this means an extra body is leaving the house for no reason when they can stay at home and be safer! Then other key workers such as supermarket staff may get a night shift that they can’t get a lift to due to mental health public transport is a no and walking in the dark is a danger! Any key worker/ essential worker this is a key part to work
attributes.background: Key workers drive to and things like cbts are expiring and some key workers that have stepped up to work need their license as a way to work to help vulnerable have a better life. In the first lockdown key workers were still allowed so I think they should bring that back ASAP!
